thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Dutch Cabinet: telecom takeovers must have government pre-approval

title: Dutch Cabinet: telecom takeovers must have government pre-approval
text:
April 19, 2018 / 5:51 AM / Updated an hour ago Dutch Cabinet: telecom takeovers must have government pre-approval Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
AMSTERDAM, April 19 (Reuters) - The Dutch Cabinet on Thursday proposed a law that would require any party wishing to attempt a takeover of a Dutch-based telecommunications company to first seek government approval. 
The proposed “Law on Undesired Control of Telecommunications” would apply to telephone, internet and data center companies, the Cabinet said in a statement. 
It cited national security interests as the reason for the law. (Reporting by Toby Sterling)
